content: baby cardigan top down raglan style by teomakes materials - circular needles 4mm - yarn - patons baby smiles 75-100gr - 4 buttons - stitch markers - stitch holders - tapestry needle gauge 20stsx30rows 10x10cm the cardigan is worked top down seamless and button band work at the same time size newborn - 3 months 3-6 months but can easily be adjusted to any size the exact measurements for the small cardigan are under arm 22cm length 21cm sleeves from under arm 12cm and for the bigger one under arm 24cm length 22cm sleeves from underarm 14cm baby raglan cardigan �1 of �3 by teomakes abbreviations r - row k2tog - knit two together st - stitch ssk - slip slip knit pm - place marker yo - yarn over k - knit kfb - knit front & back p - purl slm - slip marker cast on 40 sts knit 4 row on garter stitch knit every row set up row ws k3 pm p1 pm p6 sleeve pm p1 pm p18 back pm p1 pm p6 sleeve pm p1 pm k3 begin the raglan and v-neck increases on the right side of work r1 k2 kfb yo slm k1 slm yo k6 yo slm k1 yo k18 yo slm k1 slm yo k6 yo slm k1 slm yo kfb k2 r2 k3 purl to the last 3 sts k3 repeat r1&2 for a total of 10 times that will give you 10 raglan increases holes and 20 row for the smaller size knit 2 more row of raglan increases omitting the kfbs at the v-neck for the bigger size knit 4 more row of raglan increases omitting the kfbs separate the sleeves and body and placing the sleeve sts on stitch holders you will have 30sts for each sleeve for the small size cardigan and 34 for the bigger size leaving the sleeve sts on the stitch holders continue knitting the body of the cardigan in stockinette stitch for 10cm or the desired length remembering you work the both holes every 10 row baby raglan cardigan �2 of �3 by teomakes the bottom band can be worked in garter stitch or 1x1 rib for about 2-3cm or your desired length pick up sleeve stitches from the stitch holders and work in the round using magic loop method or dpns decreases for the sleeve were done using k2tog at the beginning of row 10 20 28 and a ssk at the end of each of those row when the sleeve measures 12cm from underarm start knitting the cuff in 1x1 rib or garter stitch for 2cm bind off on the right side of work and weave in the ends all you need to do is choose some cute buttons and sew them on and the baby cardigan is ready happy knitting baby raglan cardigan �3 of �3 by teomakes
